remarks: Perfection of a subspace.  Note that the term "perfect set" is reserved for _closed_ sets which are perfect in the subspace topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Dec-2016.)
statement:
restcls.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
restcls.2 $e |- K = ( J |`t Y ) $.
restperf $p |- ( ( J e. Top /\ Y C_ X ) -> ( K e. Perf <-> Y C_ ( ( limPt ` J ) ` Y ) ) ) $.
